name: Trade Federation Coin
note: Used to purchase custom bases or ships from the admins. See Discord for more details

name: Jedi Medallion
note: Can be turned in to admins for Force powers. Need 10 of each for Force Push, 25 of each for Force Heal and 35 of each for Force Shield.

name: Sith Medallion
note: Can be turned in to admins for Force powers. Need 10 of each for Force Push, 25 of each for Force Heal and 35 of each for Force Shield.

name: 1 Credit
note: Credits are provided as currency from the npc traders in Tosche Station. They can be used to purchase items and vehicles from the traders or to trade with other players

name: 5 Credits
note: Credits are provided as currency from the npc traders in Tosche Station. They can be used to purchase items and vehicles from the traders or to trade with other players

name: 10 Credits
note: Credits are provided as currency from the npc traders in Tosche Station. They can be used to purchase items and vehicles from the traders or to trade with other players

name: 50 Credits
note: Credits are provided as currency from the npc traders in Tosche Station. They can be used to purchase items and vehicles from the traders or to trade with other players

name: 100 Credits
note: Credits are provided as currency from the npc traders in Tosche Station. They can be used to purchase items and vehicles from the traders or to trade with other players

name: Star Map Blue
note: Star Maps are combined with Empty Datacards to create keycards that open the colored Astromech droids around the map

name: Star Map Green
note: Star Maps are combined with Empty Datacards to create keycards that open the colored Astromech droids around the map

name: Star Map Red
note: Star Maps are combined with Empty Datacards to create keycards that open the colored Astromech droids around the map

name: Blue Datacard
note: Crafted by combining a Blue Star Map with an Empty Datacard. Used to unlock the Blue Imperial Astromech Droids

name: Green Datacard
note: Crafted by combining a Green Star Map with an Empty Datacard. Used to unlock the Green Imperial Astromech Droids

name: Red Datacard
note: Crafted by combining a Red Star Map with an Empty Datacard. Used to unlock the Red Imperial Astromech Droids

name: Black Datacard
note: Found in the Sith Temple. Used to unlock the Black Imperial Astromech Droids

name: Gray Datacard
note: Found in the Jedi Temple. Used to unlock the B9E Loot Droids

name: Empty Datacard
note: Empty Data Cards are combined with Star Maps to create keycards that open the Imperial Astromech loot droids around the map

name: Chaincode
note: Combine with a Datapad to create an Active Chaincode

name: Active Chaincode
note: Created by combining a Chaincode with a Datapad. Used to open a Mando Safe

name: Datapad
note: Combine this with a Chaincode to create an Active Chaincode which is used to open a Mando Safe

name: Imperial Keycard
note: Used to open the bunker door at the Imperial Base in the NorthWest toxic zone

name: Bunker Charge
note: Used to open bunker doors at Hoth and the Mando Bunker

name: Mini-Brick Saber (Pink)
note: Can be used as a weapon or to open cans

name: Mini-Brick Saber (Red)
note: Can be used as a weapon or to open cans

name: Mini-Brick Saber (Blue)
note: Can be used as a weapon or to open cans

name: Sith Holocron
note: Created by combining two Sith Kyber Crystals. Opens the door to the Sith Temple

name: Jedi Holocron
note: Created by combining two Jedi Kyber Crystals. Opens the door to the Jedi Temple

name: Pink Kyber Crystal
note: Combine with a Machete to create a Vibroblade

name: Purple Kyber Crystal
note: Combine with a Sword to create a Jedi Force Blade

name: Orange Kyber Crystal
note: Combine with a Machete to create a Vibro Blade

name: Black Kyber Crystal
note: Combine with a sword to create a Sith Warblade

name: Nightsister Crystal
note: Combine with a Mime Mask to create a Darth Maul mask

name: Jedi Kyber Crystal
note: Combine with another Jedi Kyber Crystal to create a Jedi Holocron which opens the Jedi Temple

name: Sith Kyber Crystal
note: Combine with another Sith Kyber Crystal to create a Sith Holocron which opens the Sith Temple

name: Jedi Force blade
note: Crafted by combining a sword with a Purple Kyber Crystal

name: Sith Warblade
note: Crafted by combining a sword with a Black Kyber Crystal

name: Vibro Blade (Orange Variant)
note: Crafted by combining a Machete with an Orange Kyber Crystal

name: Vibro Blade (Pink Variant)
note: Crafted by combining a Machete with a Pink Kyber Crystal

name: Cereals
note: Can be eaten

name: Mechanical Hand
note: Can be worn on hand slot

name: Jawa Cloak
note: Can be worn to make the player appear as a large Jawa

name: Han Carbonite Craftable Storage
note: Found in Jabbas Palace. Use a hammer on it to create a 1000 slot storage container that can be hanged up in your base

name: Fireworks Launcher
note: Set on the ground and activate to launch fireworks into the air
